amendment.description: At the end of the bill, insert the following: SEC. 5. EFFECTIVE DATE. Section 2 of this Act shall not be effective until the Secretary of the Interior, in consultation with the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service, finds that the repeal under section 2 will not adversely affect Caribou herd populations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part D of House Report 116-200 to allow the bill to go into effect when DOI, in consultation with USFWS, certifies that the bill will not harm caribou herd populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A003) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 528).

action.text: Gosar amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Gosar.
